attributes.action: To Investigate the private techniques with vulnerable people of A4E and "Pathways to Work
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I saw a letter in the Times on October 7th from Robin Kempster which
seemed to describe accurately the procedures at A4E and "Pathways To Work"
when they are dealing with vulnerable claimants. the secrecy needs ending
